:::config { "language": "php" }
return [
    'extensions' => [
        // Add attributes straight from markdown.
        AttributesExtension::class, // [tl! reindex(vim.preserve)]

        // Add Torchlight syntax highlighting.
        TorchlightExtension::class,
    ]
]
:::expectation
